articles.description: Diogo Jota has scored eight goals since arriving at Liverpool from Wolves in the summer
articles.content:
Diogo Jota's 'extra quality' has helped make training even more challenging for Liverpool's defenders, Joel Matip has revealed.
The Portuguese has enjoyed a stunning start to his Anfield career sinc… [+2638 chars]

articles.author: Max Winters
articles.title: Ruiz Jnr's former trainer claims they 'lost control' of him before Joshua loss - Daily Mail
articles.description: Manny Robles, Ruiz Jnr's former trainer and as yet the only person to mastermind a defeat of Joshua, has claimed his camp 'lost control' of their fighter and points the finger at his 'new' friends.
articles.content:
The former trainer of Andy Ruiz Jnr has revealed how they 'lost control' of the Mexican fighter in the build up to his defeat by Anthony Joshua last year.
Ruiz Jnr shocked the world and embarked on … [+3290 chars]
